entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:06 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 02:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: ESE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow or ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
